meanings.definition: Darkened or discolored by exposure to the sun.
meanings.sent1: Her skin looked bistered after spending the whole day at the beach.
meanings.sent2: The old book had bistered pages from being left in the sun for too long.
meanings.sent3: The bistered banana peel looked like it had a sunburn!
meanings.sent4: The bistered sky signaled the approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The bistered wood of the fence reminded him of the hot summer days.

meanings.sent1: The artist mixed yellow and brown to create a beautiful bistered shade.
meanings.sent2: The autumn leaves had a lovely bistered hue.
meanings.sent3: The bistered paint on the wall matched the color of the desert sand.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a bistered intensity under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The bistered of the sunset painted the sky in warm tones.
